text: Roman Baskin (25 December 1954 – 13 September 2018) was an Estonian actor and director of stage and screen. His parents were Eino Baskin and Ita Ever. Baskin's credits as an actor included Lotte from Gadgetville (2006), Letters to Angel (2010), and The Idiot (2011). He directed Peace Street in 1991, and a television film adaptation of The Visit in 2006. For his career in film, Baskin received the Order of the White Star, fourth class in 2018. He was diagnosed with cancer and died on 13 September 2018. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2018 deaths Category:21st-century Estonian male actors Category:Estonian male film actors Category:Estonian male stage actors Category:Estonian male voice actors Category:Estonian film directors Category:Deaths from cancer in Estonia Category:Recipients of the Order of the White Star, 4th Class Category:Estonian Academy of Music and Theatre alumni
title: Roman Baskin
